title: Join the earlybird whitelist!
desc: Be the first to access Mail3 beta version and get your Earlybird Role in the discord!
check-desc: Connect wallet to see if you are eligible for the earlybird whitelist.
success: 🎉🎉🎉  Congratulations! You have joined the whitelist
fail: 😔 Sorry you are not qualified to join whitelist now. We invite you to join our Discord to get beta access.
earlybird-desc: Join Discord to get your Earlybird Role now！
join-community-desc: More opportunities to get beta access !
